Description.Name: EVASIVE RACING
Description.Details: PASSIVE: A Vehicle driven by the crew of this Tank Commander has a lower chance to lose evasion when fired upon.  The faster the vehicles, the more evasion can be kept. The maximum amount of evasion is increased by one.

Description.Name: EVASIVE RACING
Description.Details: PASSIVE: A 'Mech piloted by this MechWarrior has a chance to not lose evasion when fired upon.  The faster the BattleMech, the more evasion can be kept. Evasive charge cap increased by one.
